channel.title: 317 Client Error
channel.description:
Hi, Well for a while now, I have been trying to add stuff to class 20, and whenever I add like one thing, it has the error:
[IMG]http://i962.photobucket.com/albums/ae101/jkatzjk96/Capture1.png[/img]
I have been trying to add like the skillcape things, but I cant because of this. Does anyone know how to fix?

item.title: 317 Client Error
item.dc:creator: @jkjkatz96 jkjkatz96
item.description:
@jkjkatz96 wrote:

so how do i fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Client Error
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

The reason this error is happening is because your method257 is exceeding 64 kbs in length, let me explain to you why this error occurs when a Jave method is longer than 64 kbs in length. A Jave method can only hold 64 kbs in size before this error happens. I know it’s odd but it’s the way of Java, a simple solution to fixing the problem would be splitting the method in two. For example:

If my method below exceeds 64 kb the error would happen.

private static final byte[] FILE_DATA = new byte[] { //this code is under 64kbs in length

By splitting it into two methods that are under 1000 lines (or so) that would prevent the error.

private static final byte[] FILE_DATA2 = new byte[] { //this code is under 64kbs in length

Etc.

Read full topic
